DataElement.preferredName: Patient Behavior Health Outcome Consent Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no question related to consent for participation in Behavioral and Health Outcomes study

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: consent for participation in Behavioral and Health Outcomes study

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: human or animal activity studied in terms of motivation, direction, result, emotion, perception, or etiology.:The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease.:The result of an action.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: The actions or reactions of an object or organism, usually in relation to the environment or surrounding world of stimuli.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I choose to take part in the
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the Behavioral and Health Outcomes (BAHO) study. I agree to fill out the questionnaire and to have my blood submitted for the specific tests related to the BAHO study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: The patient is being registered prior to the BAHO substudy reaching full accrual.
